General.Name: SF Urban Properties AG
General.Description: SF Urban Properties AG operates as a real estate company in Switzerland. The company is involved in the development and management of its real estate portfolio. It invests in commercial, residential, and development properties. The company was formerly known as Swiss Finance & Property Investment AG and changed its name to SF Urban Properties AG in April 2019. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
